Title: ParallaxBackground - A Metro moving background
Description: A library for displaying a background that moves slower than the foreground in Windows Metro style (WinRT) applications written in C# / XAML.
HomeWiki:
ParallaxBackground - Another Metro moving background.

Binaries available at: http://nuget.org/packages/ParallaxBackground

See a discussion here: http://w8isms.blogspot.com/2012/09/parallax-background-in-xaml-revisited.html
.
